forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 16. West wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 36, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the night cloaks Boston in its serene embrace, a cool tranquility wraps itself around the city, with temperatures dipping to a brisk low. The calmness of the air, punctuated only by the whisper of a west wind, invites contemplation beneath a vast, clear sky, devoid of fog or haze. The city lights twinkle like distant stars, each illuminating the streets below with hints of life. 

In the light of the coming day, Boston is poised to unveil a mostly sunny disposition, a welcome promise after the quietude of the night. As temperatures rise, anticipate a gentle warmth, shifting later into the afternoon chill. To navigate this transitional day, layers are advisable: a warm coat, perhaps accompanied by a scarf, will serve to ward off the lingering chill as the sun casts its glow. A morning stroll through one of the city’s many parks could yield moments of reflection, while an afternoon coffee at a favorite café provides an opportunity to bask in the sunlight as it dips towards the horizon. The day may not herald springtime joy, but it offers a canvas for the ordinary joys of winter—embrace them with both grace and warmth.
